```{r}
setID = function(donnees)
{
  for (i in 1:length(donnees))
  {
    donnees[i] = i
  }
  return(donnees)
}
```

```{r}
getTeam = function(id)
{
  return(DATA3$teams$name[id])
}
```

```{r}
getCity = function(id)
{
  return(DATA3$stadiums$city[id])
}
```
